faqs.question: What's included in the 2 Machines for $22 bundle?
faqs.answer: Six-packs, double actions, and letter X papers are all included, giving you the best value for your play session.

faqs.question: Do I get free paper cards with machine play?
faqs.answer: Yes! Spend at least $1 on machines to receive 1 free paper card. Spend $2 or more to get as many paper cards as you'd like for each game.

faqs.question: Can I mix & match papers for special games?
faqs.answer: No. Papers for Odd/Even, Cover All, Lucky Seven, and Treasure Hunt cannot be mixed. Purchase complete sets (1 card for $1 or 6 cards for $5).

faqs.question: What's the Progressive Daub Ticket?
faqs.answer: A special nighttime game played in the second half of session. You must buy into session (machines or papers) to be eligible to play.

faqs.question: Do I get a free U-PIK card every time I play?
faqs.answer: Yes! Every night you play session, you receive 1 free U-PIK card as our way of saying thank you for playing with us.

faqs.question: What time does evening session start?
faqs.answer: Session starts at approximately 7:30 PM every night. Daytime pay-as-you-go games run from 10:30 AM until 7:30 PM.
